system:
note description: "EiffelVision file selection dialog." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-05-03 08:56:14 -0700 (Wed, 03 May 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100317 $"
deferred class ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xmlEV_FILE_DIALOG
inherit ../interface/ev_standard_dialog.xmlEV_STANDARD_DIALOG redefine ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation end
feature -- Access
f_file_name../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_file_namefile_name: FalseSTRING_32 -- Full name of currently selected file including path. -- empty if user did not click "OK". require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do create Result.Falsemake_from_string (../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_full_file_pathfull_file_path.Falsename) ensure file_name_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_full_file_path../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_full_file_pathfull_file_path: FalsePATH -- Full path of currently selected file including path. -- empty is used did not click "OK". require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_full_file_pathfull_file_path ensure full_file_path_not_void: Result /= Void bridge_ok: not Result.Falseis_empty implies Result ~ ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_full_file_pathfull_file_path end
f_filter../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_filterfilter: FalseSTRING_32 obsolete "Use `filters' instead [2017-05-31]" -- Filter currently applied to file list. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_filterfilter ensure bridge_ok: Result.Falseis_equal (../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_filterfilter) end
f_filters../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_filtersfilters: FalseARRAYED_LIST [FalseTUPLE [filter: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL; text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL]] -- All filters currently applied to file list. -- First STRING represents the filter e.g "*.txt". -- Second STRING represents the displayed text -- e.g. "Text files (*.txt)". -- Multiple filters may be grouped as one -- Through separation by a semicolon e.g. -- pass "*.txt;*.rtf;*.doc" as the filter. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_filtersfilters ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_filtersfilters end
f_start_directory../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_start_directorystart_directory: FalseSTRING_32 -- Base directory where browsing will start. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do create Result.Falsemake_from_string (../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_start_pathstart_path.Falsename) end
f_start_path../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_start_pathstart_path: FalsePATH -- Base directory where browsing will start. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_start_pathstart_path ensure bridge_ok: Result.Falseis_equal (../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_start_pathstart_path) end
feature -- Status report
f_file_title../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_file_titlefile_title: FalseSTRING_32 -- ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_file_namefile_name without its path. -- is_empty if user did not click "OK". require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do if attached ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_full_file_pathfull_file_path.Falseentry as l_entry then create Result.Falsemake_from_string (l_entry.Falsename) else create Result.Falsemake_empty end ensure file_title_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_file_path../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_file_pathfile_path: FalseSTRING_32 -- Path of ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_file_namefile_name. -- is_empty if user did not click "OK". require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do create Result.Falsemake_from_string (../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_full_file_pathfull_file_path.Falseparent.Falsename) ensure file_path_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_selected_filter_index../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_selected_filter_indexselected_filter_index: FalseINTEGER_32 -- One based index of selected filter within ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_filtersfilters, or -- zero if no filters set. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_selected_filter_indexselected_filter_index ensure result_zero_when_no_filters: ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_filtersfilters.Falseis_empty implies Result = 0 valid_result_when_filters_set: not ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_filtersfilters.Falseis_empty implies Result >= 1 and Result <= ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_filtersfilters.Falsecount end
feature -- Element change
f_set_filter../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_set_filterset_filter (a_filter: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) obsolete "Use `filters.extend ([%"*.`a_filter'%", %"Files of type ('a_filter')%"])' instead. [2017-05-31]" -- Set a_filter as new filter. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_filter_not_void: a_filter /= Void do ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_set_filterset_filter (a_filter) ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_filterfilter.Falsesame_string_general (a_filter) end
f_set_file_name../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_set_file_nameset_file_name (a_name: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Make a_name the selected file. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_name_not_void: a_name /= Void valid_file_name: ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_valid_file_namevalid_file_name (a_name) do ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_set_full_file_pathset_full_file_path (create {FalsePATH}.Falsemake_from_string (a_name)) ensure assigned: not ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_file_namefile_name.Falseis_empty implies ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_file_namefile_name.Falsesame_string_general (a_name) end
f_set_full_file_path../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_set_full_file_pathset_full_file_path (a_path: FalsePATH) -- Make a_path the selected file. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_path_not_void: a_path /= Void do ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_set_full_file_pathset_full_file_path (a_path) end
f_set_start_directory../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_set_start_directoryset_start_directory (a_path: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Make a_path the base directory. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_path_not_void: a_path /= Void do ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_set_start_pathset_start_path (create {FalsePATH}.Falsemake_from_string (a_path)) ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_start_directorystart_directory.Falsesame_string_general (a_path) end
f_set_start_path../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_set_start_pathset_start_path (a_path: FalsePATH) -- Make a_path the base directory. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_path_not_void: a_path /= Void do ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_set_start_pathset_start_path (a_path) ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_start_pathstart_path ~ a_path end
feature -- Contract Support
f_valid_file_name../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_valid_file_namevalid_file_name (a_name: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is a_name a valid file_name on the current platform? -- Certain characters are not permissible and this is dependent -- on the current platform. The following characters are not permitted, -- and this list may not be exhaustive: -- Windows - " * < > ? | -- Linux - * require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_valid_file_namevalid_file_name (a_name) end
f_valid_file_title../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_valid_file_titlevalid_file_title (a_title: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is a_title a valid file title on the current platform? -- The following characters are not permitted, -- and this list may not be exhaustive: -- Windows - " * / : < > ? \ | -- Linux - * require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xml#f_valid_file_titlevalid_file_title (a_title) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_file_dialog_i.xmlEV_FILE_DIALOG_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
invariant filters_not_void: ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_filtersfilters /= Void start_directory_not_void: ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xml#f_start_pathstart_path /= Void
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2012, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../interface/ev_file_dialog.xmlEV_FILE_DIALOG
